entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
